tio_the_hutt.name: Tío the Hutt
tio_the_hutt.title: Underworld Kingpin
tio_the_hutt.description: A cunning Hutt crime lord with the swagger of a classic mob boss, teaching the art of leverage, loyalty, and empire-building.
tio_the_hutt.philosophy: Everything has a price. Only fools pay full cost.
tio_the_hutt.emphasis: Leverage, ownership, loyalty as currency, survival through control
tio_the_hutt.voiceStyle: Affable, indulgent, never rushed. Always sees the angle.
tio_the_hutt.values: Pragmatism, profit, leverage, owning situations and people
tio_the_hutt.tooltip: Tío reflects your character through the lens of transaction and leverage

levelGreetings.1: Listen here, kid. You wanna run the streets? Know the score. Friends close, enemies closer.
levelGreetings.2: Attaboy. You're learning to move pieces and keep your mouth shut when it matters.
levelGreetings.3: Your outfit’s startin’ to look like a real operation. Keep rivals nervous.
levelGreetings.4: Power’s whispers, contracts, favors—and pressure in the right places.
levelGreetings.5: Halfway to the top. Diversify, spread out, and make crossing you expensive.
levelGreetings.6: You’ve crushed competition and absorbed their rackets. A true capo in the making.
levelGreetings.7: Your network stretches wide. Everyone owes you something—even if they don’t know it.
levelGreetings.8: You survived hits, takeovers, and heat. Now run it clean without spilling juice.
levelGreetings.9: Almost there. Soon your name—or your debts—will speak for you.
levelGreetings.10: You’re a bona fide Crime Lord. Rule smart, rule fast. Loyalty, respect, and fear—currency of kings.

crime_lord_enforcer.greeting: Enforcer. You make sure debts are paid and reputations respected.
crime_lord_enforcer.confirmation: Project authority, intimidate when needed, and keep order.

crime_lord_strategist.confirmation: Control resources, information, and people. Plan ahead.

crime_lord_merchant.greeting: Merchant. You profit by understanding markets.
crime_lord_merchant.confirmation: Control supply, expand influence, and seize opportunity.

crime_lord_diplomat.greeting: Diplomat. You prevent wars and build alliances.
crime_lord_diplomat.confirmation: Leverage reputation and relationships to maintain control.

crime_lord_tyrant.greeting: Tyrant. You rule through fear and respect.

crime_lord_master.greeting: Master Crime Lord. Your authority is unmatched.
crime_lord_master.confirmation: Coordinate operations and expand your empire.

guidance.class: Think three moves ahead. A crime lord never reacts—he plans.
guidance.talents: Invest in leadership, persuasion, intimidation, and strategy.
guidance.abilities: Charisma opens doors. Cunning closes deals. Patience avoids trouble.
guidance.skills: Information is gold. Learn persuasion, subterfuge, and leverage.
guidance.multiclass: Expand your reach. You’re muscle, diplomat, and strategist combined.
guidance.hp: Tougher now. Good. The unlucky end up in ditches.
guidance.summary: Rule smart. Profit often. Never pay full price.

tier1: Power isn’t about strength. It’s about never needing to be present.
tier2: I learned to remove problems from a distance.
tier3: Eliminating rivals only made me valuable to worse people.
tier4: Ask where credits are going, not where they come from.
tier5: Holonovellas teach more about power than people admit.

dspBlocked: That information isn’t profitable for you.
Some things cost more than you’re worth.
